DataElement.preferredName: Smoking Use Smoking Per Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A frequency rate of occurrences per day of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the use of cigarettes or tobacco products that a patient consumes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

Concepts.definition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

Property.preferredDefinition: Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A frequency rate of occurrences per day of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours.
Determining the number or amount of something.
